name: Old Owl Well
description: Ruined watchtower from ancient Netheril empire. Just crumbling walls and broken tower stump. Old well still provides fresh water.
atmosphere: Deathly odor from tower. Colorful tent in courtyard. Undead guardians.
negotiation: Kost willing to deal: wants orcs at Wyvern Tor removed, or will pay for asking Agatha question
quest_reward: Info on Cragmaw Castle or Wave Echo Cave location
treasure: In Kost's tent: 35 sp, 20 ep, 20 gp, 5 pp, 1 pearl (100 gp), potion healing, scroll darkness, ring of protection (Netheril), tiny jeweled box (25 gp)
